simple_tools_group.simple_tools.name: Simple Tools
item.simple_tools.block_searcher.tip.nor: §7Right-click to search the blocks... §r§5[Alt]§r§7 to read more.
item.simple_tools.block_searcher.tip.alt: §7Alt + right-click to change the searching diameter.
§7Put a block at your offhand, then
§7Right-click a block to search the blocks.
item.simple_tools.block_searcher.offhand: [Block searcher] Error: There's no block at offhand.
[Block searcher] Error: The item at offhand is not a block.
item.simple_tools.block_searcher.not_fou: [Block searcher] Do not searched any block.
item.simple_tools.nether_portal_frame_ge: §7Right-click a block to generate a nether portal if the space is enough.
[Nether portal frame generator] Error: Cannot generate a nether portal frame in the end.
[Nether portal frame generator] Error: No enough space.
[Nether portal frame generator] Error: Obsidian is not enough.
[Nether portal frame generator] Started to generate.
[Nether portal frame generator] Generated a nether portal frame.
item.simple_tools.block_placer.tip.norma: §7Right-click to place the blocks... §r§5[Alt]§r§7 to read more.
item.simple_tools.block_placer.tip.alt.l: §7Put a block on your offhand, then
§7Ctrl + right-click to change the place mode.
§7Alt + right-click to change the placing diameter.
item.simple_tools.block_placer.offhand_e: [Block placer] Error: There's no block at offhand.
item.simple_tools.block_placer.offhand_i: [Block placer] Error: The item at offhand is not a block.
item.simple_tools.block_placer.out_of_th: [Block placer] Error: Some positions need to place are out of the world.
item.simple_tools.block_placer.not_suppo: [Block placer] Error: Cannot place %s by block placer.
item.simple_tools.block_placer.changed_d: [Block placer] Changed the diameter of placing into
item.simple_tools.block_placer.place_mod: [Block placer] Mode 2: Vertical placement (Along axis x).
[Block placer] Mode 3: Vertical placement (Along axis z).
item.simple_tools.block_placer.failed_to: [Block placer] Failed to place %s on %s , because the block you're replacing is not replaceable
item.simple_tools.slime_block_placer.tip: §7Ctrl + right-click to change the place mode.
item.simple_tools.slime_block_placer.no_: [Slime block placer] Error: You have no slime block to place.
[Slime block placer] Error: No space to place slime blocks.
item.simple_tools.slime_block_placer.cha: [Slime block placer] Changed the diameter of placing into %s block(s).
item.simple_tools.player_stealer.tip.nor: §7Right-click a player to steal his/her inventory.
item.simple_tools.player_stealer.object_: [Player stealer] Error: You are not trying to steal a player.
item.simple_tools.player_stealer.no_item: [Player stealer] Do not steal any item, because the inventory is empty.
item.simple_tools.player_stealer.be_stol: [Player stealer] Your inventory was stolen by %s.
item.simple_tools.player_stealer.unenabl: [Player error] Error: Player stealer is not enabled.
command.simple_tools.st_settings:
[Settings] Command of /st_settings:
- block_placer
- block_searcher
- nether_portal_frame_generator
- player_stealer
- slime_block_stealer
command.simple_tools.st_settings.block_p:
[Settings - Block placer] Command of /st_settings block_placer:
- max_diameter <INT>
- min_diameter <INT>

Max diameter: %s blocks.
Min diameter: %s blocks.
command.simple_tools.st_settings.block_s:
[Settings - Block searcher] Command of /st_settings block_searcher:
- max_diameter <INT>
- min_diameter <INT>
- show_position <BOOL>

Max diameter: %s blocks.
Min diameter: %s blocks.
Show position: %s.
command.simple_tools.st_settings.nether_:
[Settings - Nether portal frame generator] Command of /st_settings nether_portal_frame_generator:
- max_height <INT>
- min_height <INT>
- max_width <INT>
- min_width <INT>

Max height: %s blocks.
Min height: %s blocks.
Max width: %s blocks.
Min width: %s blocks.
command.simple_tools.st_settings.slime_b:
[Settings - Slime block placer] Command of /st_settings slime_block_placer:
- max_diameter <INT>
- min_diameter <INT>

Max diameter: %s blocks.
Min diameter: %s blocks.
command.simple_tools.st_settings.player_:
[Settings - Player stealer] Command of /st_settings player_stealer:
- on
- off

Enabled: %s.
